tatami.core.util.graph.representation

Class LinearGraphRepresentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.core.util.logging.Unit
      • tatami.core.util.graph.representation.GraphRepresentation
        • tatami.core.util.graph.representation.LinearGraphRepresentation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GraphicalGraphRepresentation, TextGraphRepresentation

    public abstract class LinearGraphRepresentation
extends GraphRepresentation
    Class that allows the representation of a Graph structure. Also can be written as GrapheR

    An instance remains associated with the same Graph instance for all of its lifecycle.

    Author:
    Andrei Olaru
